verses.verse: Paul<WG3972>, a apostle<WG652>, (not<WG3756> of<WG575> men<WG444>, neither<WG3761> by<WG1223> man<WG444>, but<WG235> by<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, and<WG2532> God<WG2316> the Father<WG3962>, who<WG3588> raised<WG1453> him<WG846> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>)
And<WG2532> all<WG3956> the brothers<WG80> which are<WG3588> with<WG4862> me<WG1698>, unto the churches<WG1577> of Galatia<WG1053>:
Grace<WG5485> be to you<WG5213> and<WG2532> peace<WG1515> from<WG575> God<WG2316> the Father<WG3962>, and<WG2532> from our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>,

Who<WG3588> gave<WG1325> himself<WG1438> for<WG5228> our<WG2257> sins<WG266>, that<WG3704> he might deliver<WG1807> us<WG2248> from<WG1537> this<WG3588> present<WG1764> evil<WG4190> world<WG165>, according to<WG2596> the will<WG2307> of God<WG2316> and<WG2532> our<WG2257> Father<WG3962>:
To whom<WG3739> be glory<WG1391> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>. Amen<WG281>.

I marvel<WG2296> that<WG3754> you are<WG3346> so<WG3779> soon<WG5030> removed<WG3346> from<WG575> him that<WG3588> called<WG2564> you<WG5209> into<WG1722> the grace<WG5485> of Christ<WG5547> unto<WG1519> another<WG2087> gospel<WG2098>:

Which<WG3739> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> another<WG1487>; but<WG3361> there be<WG1526> some<WG5100> that<WG3588> trouble<WG5015> you<WG5209>, and<WG2532> would<WG2309> pervert<WG3344> the gospel<WG2098> of Christ<WG5547>.

But<WG235><WG99999> though<WG1437> we<WG2249>, or<WG2228> a angel<WG32> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772>, preach any other gospel<WG2097> unto you<WG5213> than<WG3844> that which<WG3739> we have preached<WG2097> unto you<WG5213>, let him be<WG2077> accursed<WG331>.

As<WG5613> we said before<WG4280>, so<WG2532> say I<WG3004> now<WG737> again<WG3825>, If<WG1487> any<WG5100> man preach any other gospel<WG2097> unto you<WG5209> than<WG3844> that<WG3739> you have received<WG3880>, let him be<WG2077> accursed<WG331>.

For<WG1063> do I<WG3982> now<WG737> persuade<WG3982> men<WG444>, or<WG2228> God<WG2316>? Or<WG2228> do I seek<WG2212> to please<WG700> men<WG444>? For<WG1063> if<WG1487> I<WG700> yet<WG2089> pleased<WG700> men<WG444>, I should<WG302> not<WG3756> be<WG2252> the servant<WG1401> of Christ<WG5547>.

But<WG1161> I declare<WG1107> to you<WG5213>, brothers<WG80>, that<WG3588> the gospel<WG2098> which<WG3588> was preached<WG2097> by<WG5259> me<WG1700><WG99999> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> after<WG2596> man<WG444>.

For<WG1063> I<WG1473> neither<WG3761> received<WG3880> it<WG846> from<WG3844> man<WG444>, neither<WG3777> was I taught<WG1321> it<WG235>, but I received it by<WG1223> the revelation<WG602> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>.

For<WG1063> you have heard of<WG191> my<WG1699> behavior<WG391> in times past<WG4218> in<WG1722> the Jews<WG2454>' religion, how that<WG3754> beyond<WG2596> measure<WG5236> I persecuted<WG1377> the church<WG1577> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> destroyed<WG4199> it<WG846>:

And<WG2532> profited<WG4298> in<WG1722> the Jews<WG2454>' religion above<WG5228> many<WG4183> of my equals<WG4915> in<WG1722> my own<WG3450> nation<WG1085>, being<WG5225> more exceedingly<WG4056> zealous<WG2207> of the traditions<WG3967> of my<WG3450> fathers<WG3862>.

But<WG1161> when<WG3753> it pleased<WG2106> God<WG2316>, who<WG3588> separated<WG873> me<WG3165> from<WG1537> my<WG3450> mother<WG3384>'s womb<WG2836>, and<WG2532> called<WG2564> me by<WG1223> his<WG846> grace<WG5485>,

To reveal<WG601> his<WG846> Son<WG5207> in<WG1722> me<WG1698>, that<WG2443> I might preach<WG2097> him<WG846> among<WG1722> the Nations<WG1484>; immediately<WG2112> I conferred<WG4323> not<WG3756> with flesh<WG4561> and<WG2532> blood<WG129>:

Neither<WG3761> went I up<WG424> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414> to<WG4314> them which were<WG3588> apostles<WG652> before<WG4253> me<WG1700>; but<WG235> I went<WG565> into<WG1519> Arabia<WG688>, and<WG2532> returned<WG5290> again<WG3825> unto<WG1519> Damascus<WG1154>.

Then<WG1899> after<WG3326> three<WG5140> years<WG2094> I went up<WG424> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414> to see<WG2477> Peter<WG4074>, and<WG2532> stayed<WG1961> with<WG4314> him<WG846> fifteen<WG1178> days<WG2250>.
But<WG1161> others<WG2087> of the apostles<WG652> saw I<WG1492> none<WG3756>, except<WG1508> James<WG2385> the<WG80> Lord<WG2962>'s brother<WG80>.
Now<WG1161> the things which<WG3739> I write<WG1125> unto you<WG5213>, behold<WG2400>, before<WG1799> God<WG2316>, I lie<WG5574><WG99999> not<WG3756>.
Afterwards<WG1899> I came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the regions<WG2824> of Syria<WG4947> and<WG2532> Cilicia<WG2791>;
And<WG1161> was<WG2252> unknown<WG50> by face<WG4383> unto the churches<WG1577> of Judea<WG2449> which were<WG3588> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547>:

But<WG1161> they had<WG2258> heard<WG191> only<WG3440>, That<WG3754> he which<WG3588> persecuted<WG1377> us<WG2248> in times past<WG4218> now<WG3568> preaches<WG2097> the faith<WG4102> which<WG3739> once<WG4218> he destroyed<WG4199>.
And<WG2532> they glorified<WG1392> God<WG2316> in<WG1722> me<WG1698>.
